void work_(linkStack* S,LinkQueue* Q) {
char temp;
LinkStack S1;
InitStack(&S1);
while (PoP(S, &temp)) {
if (temp == â€˜)â€™) {
work_(S,Q);
}
else if (temp != â€˜(â€˜) {
//PoP(&S, &temp);
Push(&S1, temp);
}
else {
char head;
if (PoP(&S1, &head)) {
EnQueue(Q, head);
while (PoP(&S1, &temp)) {
EnQueue(Q, temp);
EnQueue(Q, head);
}
}
else {
while (DeQueue(Q, &temp)) {
Push(&S1, temp);
}
PoP(&S1, &head);
EnQueue(Q, head);
while (PoP(&S1, &temp)) {
EnQueue(Q, temp);
EnQueue(Q, head);
}
}
break;
}
}
}

int main() {
char tmp;
char str[10000];
int len = 0;
LinkStack S;
InitStack(&S);
LinkStack ans;
InitStack(&ans);
printf(â€œè¯·è¾“å…¥é­”ç‹çš„è¯­è¨€#ç»“æŸï¼šâ€);
while ((tmp = getchar()) != â€˜#â€™) //è¾“å…¥#ç»“æŸ
{

len++;

for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
Push(&S, str[i]);
}
while (PoP(&S, &tmp)) {
if (tmp == â€˜)â€™) {
LinkQueue Q;
InitQueue(&Q);
work_(&S,&Q);
while (DeQueue(&Q, &tmp)) {
Push(&ans, tmp);
}
}
else {
Push(&ans, tmp);
}
}
char sb;
while (PoP(&ans, &sb)) {
printf(â€œ%câ€, sb);
}
return 0;
}

       Point  p1;    Point  p2;    Point  p3;    char  info[2];    //ä¿ç•™æ•°æ®ï¼Œå±æ€§ä¿¡æ¯};int main(){    Head head;    FILE* fp;    char fileName[128];    fp = fopen("1.stl", "rb");    if (fp != NULL)    {        fread(head.partName, 80, 1, fp);        fread(&head.faceNum, 4, 1, fp);    }    Face* faces = (Face*)malloc(head.faceNum * sizeof(Face));    for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        fread(&faces[i].normal, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].p1, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].p2, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].p3, 12, 1, fp);        fread(&faces[i].info, 2, 1, fp);    }    fclose(fp);    double sum = 0;        //è¡¨é¢ç§¯    double v=0;        //ä½“ç§¯    for (int i = 0; i < head.faceNum; i++)    {        //è¡¨é¢ç§¯è®¡ç®—        double sa = sqrt((faces[i].p1.x - faces[i].p2.x) * (faces[i].p1.x - faces[i].p2.x) + (faces[i].p1.y- faces[i].p2.y) * (faces[i].p1.y - faces[i].p2.y) + (faces[i].p1.z- faces[i].p2.z) * (faces[i].p1.z - faces[i].p2.z));        double sb = sqrt((faces[i].p2.x - faces[i].p3.x) * (faces[i].p2.x - faces[i].p3.x) + (faces[i].p2.y - faces[i].p3.y) * (faces[i].p2.y - faces[i].p3.y) + (faces[i].p2.z - faces[i].p3.z) * (faces[i].p2.z - faces[i].p3.z));        double sc = sqrt((faces[i].p3.x - faces[i].p1.x) * (faces[i].p3.x - faces[i].p1.x) + (faces[i].p3.y - faces[i].p1.y) * (faces[i].p3.y - faces[i].p1.y) + (faces[i].p3.z - faces[i].p1.z) * (faces[i].p3.z - faces[i].p1.z));        double sp = (sa + sb + sc) / 2;        sum = sum + sqrt(sp * (sp - sa) * (sp - sb) * (sp - sc));        //ä½“ç§¯è®¡ç®—        double x1,x2,x3,y1,y2,y3,z1,z2,z3;        x1=faces[i].p1.x;y1=faces[i].p1.y;z1=faces[i].p1.z;        x2=faces[i].p2.x;y2=faces[i].p2.y;z2=faces[i].p2.z;        x3=faces[i].p3.x;y3=faces[i].p3.y;z3=faces[i].p3.z;        Eigen::Matrix<double,4,4>matrix_44;        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x2,x3,x2,y1,y2,y3,y2,z1,z2,z3,-10;        double v1=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x1,x2,x3,y1,y1,y2,y3,z1,-10,-10,z3;        double v2=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        matrix_44 << 1,1,1,1,x1,x2,x3,x3,y1,y2,y3,y3,-10,-10,-10,z3;        double v3=abs(matrix_44.determinant())*(1.0/6.0);        double vs=v1+v2+v3;        Eigen::Matrix<double,1,3>f;        f << faces[i].normal.i, faces[i].normal.j, faces[i].normal.k;        Eigen::Matrix<double,3,1>p;        p << 0,0,1;        double s = f.dot(p);        if(s>0){          v=v+vs;        }else if(s<0){          v=v-vs;        }    }    printf("è¡¨é¢ç§¯ä¸ºï¼š%lf
", sum);    printf("ä½“ç§¯ä¸º: %lf
",v);    return 0;}
